title: Acer at IFA 2018: ultra-thin laptops and gaming thrones
description: Acer announced a ton of cool products at IFA 2018 in Berlin: the Swift 7, which Acer is calling the thinnest laptop in the world; the Predator Triton 900, a 2-in-1 convertible gaming PC; and the massive Predator Thronos motorized gaming chair. But most of them arent actually at the show, and prices and release dates are scarce.
